Post.title: linuxOrder
Post._content:
## 1Linux

|   |                |
| ----- | ------------------ |
| pwd   |          |
| ls    |    |
| cd    |        |
| cat   |      |
| grep  |  |
| cp    |            |
| touch |            |
| mv    |            |
| rm    |            |
| rmdir |            |
| vi    |            |

### 1.1 pwd

print working directory()pwdLinux

### 1.2 cd 

cd / 
		cd ~ /home/user
		cd /usr usr-------------
		cd test test-------

### 1.3 ls 

 
		-a 
		-l 
		-f 
		-r 
		-R 
		-s 
		-h KMG

ls -l examples.doc examples.doc

### 1.4 cat

cat
		cat snow.txt snow.txtctrl+Dcat

### 1.5 grep 

grep money test.txt
		test.txtmoneygrep

### 1.6 touch

touch
		touch newfile newfile

### 1.7 cp 

cp
		cp t.txt Document/t t.txtDocumentt
		 
		-I 
		-r 
		-v 

### 1.8 mv 

 
		-I 
		-f 
		-v 
		mv t.txt Document t.txt Document

### 1.9 rm 

 
		-I 
		-f 
		-v 
		-r 
		rm t.txt t.txt

### 1.10 rmdir 

### 1.11 find  

****


		-name    
		-iname   
		-inum    inode

`/home/linuxize``document.pdf`

> find /home/linuxize -type f -name document.pdf

****


		-type d  
		-type f  
		-type l  

`/var/log/nginx``.log.gz`

> 	find /var/log/nginx -type f -name '*.log.gz'

****

> find -name java*                     # java
> 		find -name java* fprint file         # javafile
> 		find -name ap* -o -name may*         # apmay

### 1.12 vi UNIXUNIXLinuxvivimvivi Improvedvivi

vi filename :,
		vi n filename ,n
		vi filename ,
		vi /pattern filename,pattern
		vi -r filename vi,filename
		vi filename....filename ,


		Ctrl u
		Ctrl d
		Ctrl f
		Ctrlb
		nzn,n.
		
		i 
		I 
		a
		A
		o
		O
		r
		R,ESC
		s,


		ESC 
		:w vi
		:w file filevi
		:w! vi
		:wq vi
		:wq! vi
		:q vi
		:q! vi
		:e!

## 1Linux

|   |                |
| ----- | ------------------ |
| pwd   |          |
| ls    |    |

| cat   |      |
| grep  |  |

| touch |            |
| mv    |            |

print working directory()pwdLinux

### 1.2 cd 

cd / 
		cd ~ /home/user

		cd test test-------

		-a 
		-l 
		-f

ls -l examples.doc examples.doc

### 1.4 cat

		cat snow.txt snow.txtctrl+Dcat

### 1.5 grep

		test.txtmoneygrep

### 1.6 touch

		touch newfile newfile

### 1.7 cp

		cp t.txt Document/t t.txtDocumentt
		 
		-I 
		-r 
		-v

		-I 
		-f 
		-v

### 1.9 rm 

 
		-I 
		-f 
		-v 
		-r 
		rm t.txt t.txt

### 1.10 rmdir 

### 1.11 find  

****


		-name    
		-iname   
		-inum    inode

`/home/linuxize``document.pdf`

> find /home/linuxize -type f -name document.pdf

****


		-type d  
		-type f  
		-type l  

`/var/log/nginx``.log.gz`

> 	find /var/log/nginx -type f -name '*.log.gz'

****

> find -name java*                     # java
> 		find -name java* fprint file         # javafile
> 		find -name ap* -o -name may*         # apmay

vi filename :,
		vi n filename ,n
		vi filename ,
